channel.title: Tele all command?

item.title: Tele all command?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Change your second code to this.

} public void teletome() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.toX = absX; castOn.toY = absY; castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

item.title: Tele all command?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

This is the commandâ€¦

if(command.startsWith("teleall") && playerRights > 2){ teletome(); }

This is my loop, but it only teleports whoever is close to me? Help?

} public void teletome() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.toX = absX; castOn.toY = absY; castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

If someone understand what the problem is can you fix it please?
